title: Duke Nukem 3d WinXP-Vista (Original no MOD) - Internet Multiplay
description:
== Update 03/2009 ==


Duke Nukem 3D PC ported to Win32 (Xp, Vista). Free and open source. 

This is not a mod. It uses the same original graphics/engine as the original Duke 3D. 

The pack allows to play in Single mode (against the monsters) or in Multiplayer mode (Death Match or Coop games). This pack is mostly used by gamers who play Duke3D online. It is not for mod nor to use hacked graphics or HRP. Yes there are still some players playing that game online, all day and night long. 

The Pack contains: 
=================

- Duke Nukem 3D port.
- YANG (internet multiplayer client for Duke)
- Some popular user maps for death match and coop
- Hi resolution tunes (you can turn them off by deleting the tunes folder in which case Duke will use the original tunes)

Change over my previous torrent: 
===============================

- Changed the internet clients dukesterx and Dukonnector to YANG. 
- Fixed too long path bug in the zip archive.

Enjoy the best FPS game ever created!

-= Dr Mad =-
